sentences.chinese: 未偵測到晶片組散熱器。

sentences.english: O The chess control balance helps to detect the errors that do not influence equalities .
sentences.chinese: 國際象棋控制的平衡，有助於偵測錯誤，不影響等式。

sentences.english: Because of new technology, scams have become even trickier to detect.
sentences.chinese: 因爲新科技，騙錢術變得更詭詐而難以偵測。

sentences.english: Probably they will make us walk through metal detectors like at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 可能像機場那樣必須通過偵測器。

sentences.english: The team is using an imaging system based on mass spectrometry to detect swathes of signals at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 研究團隊利用質譜分析儀成像系統同時偵測衆多信號。

sentences.english: No In fact, I'm a land-surveying geometrician.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，我是做土地偵測工作的。

sentences.english: Only detected database files will be displayer.
sentences.chinese: 只有偵測到的資料庫檔案，將顯示器。

sentences.english: The enemy can detect the smoke and light it produces.
sentences.chinese: 敵人可偵測到火所產生的煙霧與亮光。

sentences.english: You must be able to see the effect of the conjuration or zone.
sentences.chinese: 你必須能夠看到或者用其他方法偵測到效應。

sentences.english: Now lass, Detect Evil on 'im an' me agin.
sentences.chinese: 現在，丫頭，再在俺和他身上偵測邪惡。

sentences.english: But we are not only tracking one finger, here.
sentences.chinese: 而且我們不只偵測一根手指。

sentences.english: But explosives detection remains a problem in mass transit.
sentences.chinese: 但要在熙攘人流中偵測爆炸物，確實是個難題。

sentences.english: It is also used as a propellant in food aerosols and as a leak detector.
sentences.chinese: 也可作爲食品煙霧劑中的壓縮氣體和漏出物偵測器。

sentences.english: The bootstrapper first detects whether any of the prerequisites are already installed.
sentences.chinese: 啓動載入器會先偵測所有必要條件是否已經安裝。

sentences.english: A piece of corroborating evidence has been the detection of hydrogen molecules in IVCs.
sentences.chinese: 在IVC裏偵測到的氫分子，是一件強化的證據。

sentences.english: I'm checking the smoke detectors just in case there is a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我在檢查煙霧偵測器，以防發生火災。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
out of order (of machine)/not working properly/a failing (of a system)
